lateral.text: You discover a door in your home you've never noticed before. What do you do?
lateral.options: Immediately open it to explore | Research the house's history first | Ask others if they've seen it | Leave it alone - it was hidden for a reason | Test if it's real or imagined

lateral.text: If colors had personalities, which would be the leader?
lateral.options: Red - bold and commanding | Blue - calm and strategic | Gold - prestigious and traditional | Purple - mysterious and wise | Green - balanced and growth-oriented

lateral.text: You can speak to one type of animal for a day. Which provides the most valuable insights?
lateral.options: Birds - they see everything from above | Cats - they know secrets of independence | Dogs - they understand loyalty | Ants - they've mastered cooperation | Dolphins - they play while being intelligent

lateral.text: You're given a magic notebook that makes written plans happen. What's your first concern?
lateral.options: My handwriting might cause misinterpretations | I need to plan the perfect first entry | What if I change my mind later? | Testing with something small first | Whether I deserve this power

lateral.text: Your life is a video game. What's your biggest achievement?
lateral.options: 100% completion rate | Speedrun record holder | Most creative solutions | Helping most other players | Finding all easter eggs

lateral.text: You must organize a library where books arrange themselves by...
lateral.options: How much they've changed someone's life | The emotions they evoke | Their hidden connections to each other | The questions they answer | The worlds they create

lateral.text: You're a battery. What charges you most efficiently?
lateral.options: Being plugged into a group celebration | Solar power from quiet contemplation | Quick bursts from brief interactions | Slow steady charge from one deep connection | Wireless charging from being near others

lateral.text: In a world where thoughts are visible as colors above heads, you prefer...
lateral.options: Vibrant rainbow crowds - so much to see | Subtle pastels - gentle and non-intrusive | Bold primaries - clear and direct | Invisible option - privacy matters | Selective visibility - control who sees

lateral.text: You're designing a personal workspace. The walls are...
lateral.options: Glass - see and be seen | One-way mirrors - observe but private | Convertible - walls that appear/disappear | Covered in interaction points | Soundproof but with windows

lateral.text: You find a wallet with $1000. The ID shows someone wealthy. Your first thought?
lateral.options: Return it immediately - it's theirs | Donate the cash, return the wallet | Check if there's a reward first | They won't miss it as much as I need it | Post online to find them publicly

lateral.text: In a game where you can only win if others lose, you...
lateral.options: Find a way for everyone to win instead | Win efficiently to minimize their loss | Play your best - that's the game | Let others win sometimes | Refuse to play

lateral.text: You can read emotions as weather patterns around people. You focus on...
lateral.options: Storm warnings to offer help | Sunny people to enjoy their energy | Your own forecast first | Overall climate of the room | Interesting unusual patterns

lateral.text: Your emotions are playlist. What's on repeat most often?
lateral.options: Carefully curated mix - balanced | Whatever's trending - goes with flow | Same comfort songs - predictable | Wildly varies - emotional DJ | Trying to find the off button

lateral.text: You're sailing a boat. A storm approaches. Your instinct?
lateral.options: Sail straight through - fastest route | Find shelter immediately | Enjoy the thrill of the challenge | Calculate optimal path around it | Prepare for worst while hoping for best

lateral.text: Your mind is a house. The basement contains...
lateral.options: Organized archive of experiences | Things I'm not ready to sort yet | I don't go down there | Hidden treasures and old fears | Workshop where I process things

lateral.text: You wake up with the ability to freeze time for everyone but you. First hour?
lateral.options: Fix things people are struggling with | Explore places I couldn't normally | Catch up on everything I'm behind on | Study frozen moments like art | Plan how to use this responsibly

lateral.text: You're writing your autobiography but each chapter must be a different genre. Chapter 1 is...
lateral.options: Mystery - understanding myself | Adventure - all the risks I took | Comedy - laughing at my mistakes | Drama - the relationships that shaped me | Science fiction - who I'm becoming

lateral.text: You discover your reflection sometimes does things differently than you. This means...
lateral.options: I'm seeing my potential self | My subconscious is communicating | Parallel universe crossing over | I need to pay attention to what I'm suppressing | Time to experiment with the mirror

lateral.text: In dreams, you always return to the same mysterious place. It's...
lateral.options: A library with books I've never read | A garden where each plant is a memory | An empty theater waiting for performance | A workshop full of unfinished projects | A crossroads with infinite paths

lateral.text: You're tasked with designing a new emotion. It feels like...
lateral.options: The moment before a first kiss | Solving a puzzle after hours of trying | Finding something you didn't know you lost | The silence after perfect music ends | Watching someone become who they're meant to be

lateral.text: If your personality was a recipe, the main ingredient would be...
lateral.options: Curiosity with a dash of chaos | Reliability slow-cooked to perfection | Enthusiasm with surprise spices | Carefully measured empathy | Adaptability with seasonal variations

lateral.text: You're an architect of realities. Your signature style includes...
lateral.options: Hidden doors to everywhere | Rooms that adapt to occupants' needs | Windows showing different times | Spaces that connect distant people | Structures that grow and evolve
